languages.text: "Есть разница между эффективными тактиками и тактиками террора. Вы говорите о втором. Этот мир не должен потерять людей больше необходимого, или Райкаду Минорис будет сложно вернуться к служению Империуму".

"There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Есть разница между эффективными тактиками и тактиками террора. Вы говорите о втором. Этот мир не должен потерять людей больше необходимого, или Райкаду Минорис будет сложно вернуться к служению Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to climb back to serving the Imperium."

"There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to climb back to serving the Imperium."

"There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

languages.text: "Es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen effektiver Taktik und Terror. Ihr plant Letzteres. Diese Welt darf nicht mehr Leute als nötig verlieren, sonst kehrt Rykad Minoris nie in den Dienst des Imperiums zurück."
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen effektiver Taktik und Terror. Ihr plant Letzteres. Diese Welt darf nicht mehr Leute als nötig verlieren, sonst kehrt Rykad Minoris nie in den Dienst des Imperiums zurück."

languages.text: « Il faut savoir distinguer les tactiques efficaces et la terreur. Vous faites référence à la seconde. Ce monde ne doit pas perdre plus d'habitants que nécessaire, ou Rykad Minoris aura les plus grandes difficultés à servir de nouveau l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut savoir distinguer les tactiques efficaces et la terreur. Vous faites référence à la seconde. Ce monde ne doit pas perdre plus d'habitants que nécessaire, ou Rykad Minoris aura les plus grandes difficultés à servir de nouveau l'Imperium. »

languages.text: «Existe una diferencia entre una táctica eficaz y un acto de terror. Usted sugiere lo segundo. Este planeta no debe perder más gente de lo necesario, o Rykad Minoris tendrá dificultades para servir al Imperium como antes».
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Existe una diferencia entre una táctica eficaz y un acto de terror. Usted sugiere lo segundo. Este planeta no debe perder más gente de lo necesario, o Rykad Minoris tendrá dificultades para servir al Imperium como antes».

languages.text: “战术措施与恐怖主义是有区别的，而你的建议指的是后者。这个世界损失的平民数量不能超过必要限额，否则小莱卡德将很难再次为帝国服务。”
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “战术措施与恐怖主义是有区别的，而你的建议指的是后者。这个世界损失的平民数量不能超过必要限额，否则小莱卡德将很难再次为帝国服务。”

languages.text: 「効果的な戦術と恐怖には違いがあります。あなたは後者について言っているのですね。この惑星は、必要以上に多くの命を失ってはなりません。さもないと、ライカド・ミノリスが再び帝国に仕えることは難しくなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「効果的な戦術と恐怖には違いがあります。あなたは後者について言っているのですね。この惑星は、必要以上に多くの命を失ってはなりません。さもないと、ライカド・ミノリスが再び帝国に仕えることは難しくなるでしょう」

languages.text: "Etkili taktikler uygulamakla dehşet saçmak arasında fark var. Siz dehşet saçmaktan bahsediyorsunuz. Bu dünya, gerekenden fazla insan kaybetmemeli. Aksi takdirde Rykad Minoris, İmparatorluk'a hizmetine devam etmekte zorlanır."
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between effective tactics and terror. You are referring to the second. This world must not lose more people than is necessary, or Rykad Minoris will struggle to return to serving the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Etkili taktikler uygulamakla dehşet saçmak arasında fark var. Siz dehşet saçmaktan bahsediyorsunuz. Bu dünya, gerekenden fazla insan kaybetmemeli. Aksi takdirde Rykad Minoris, İmparatorluk'a hizmetine devam etmekte zorlanır."
